item.description:
Hi everyone,

Now, we know that week of terrors had come to end. So, I discussed with Erika and we decided that we will resume Sunday ASL meetup tomorrow.

Same time, Same place, and same rule (No voice and bring notepad and pen to communicate when you have trouble signing with people)

WHEN: April 21, 2013

WHERE: Tavern in Square in Porter Square, 1815 Massachusetts Avenue, Cambridge, Massachusetts

WHY: To get together and support each other through our beautiful language.

TIME: 4 pm to 6 pm but most of times we stay longer because its Deaf Culture Standard that ASL and deaf events doesn't have to cut short.

Best,

Sean on behalf Erika and Jack
item.how_to_find_us: Find us signing our beautiful language to inspire you!
item.name: Sunday ASL meetup
